name: app-base
description: Basic setup project for react, express, graphql and apollo client stack

scripts.dev: rm -rf ./build; NODE_ENV=development concurrently -c blue,cyan,magenta "RUN_ENV=client webpack-dev-server --mode=development -d --inline --no-info --port 3001 --config ./webpack/config" "RUN_ENV=server webpack --mode=development --watch --config ./webpack/config" "sleep 3 && nodemon --inspect --watch build/server.js build/server.js"
scripts.dev-build: rm -rf ./build; NODE_ENV=development concurrently -c blue,cyan "RUN_ENV=server webpack --mode=development --progress --config ./webpack/config" "RUN_ENV=client webpack --mode=development --progress --config ./webpack/config"
scripts.build: rm -rf ./build; NODE_ENV=production concurrently -c blue,cyan "RUN_ENV=server webpack --mode=production --progress --config ./webpack/config" "RUN_ENV=client webpack --mode=production --progress --config ./webpack/config"

author: Ajith K S
